scripts.create_deployer: soroban config identity generate alice && soroban config identity fund alice --network testnet
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:hello && npm run deploy:incrementor
scripts.setup: soroban contract build && if [ ! -d .soroban ]; then npm run create_deployer && npm run deploy; fi
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run setup
scripts.bindings:hello: soroban contract bindings typescript --network testnet --contract-id $(cat .soroban/hello-id) --output-dir node_modules/hello-soroban-client
scripts.bindings:incrementor: soroban contract bindings typescript --network testnet --contract-id $(cat .soroban/incrementor-id) --output-dir node_modules/incrementor-client
scripts.postinstall: if [ ! -d .soroban ]; then npm run setup; fi && npm run bindings:hello && npm run bindings:incrementor
